ygData.subject: Re: Question of Aesthetics
ygData.msgSnippet: Umm , Im showing my ignorance here, Music Trigger ? ... From: James Schuldes  To: eqbards@onelist.com  Date: Monday,
ygData.messageBody:
Umm , Im showing my ignorance here, "Music Trigger"?
-----Original Message-----
From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com' <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, June 28, 1999 4:26 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Question of Aesthetics


>From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
>I am not sure if it looks different - maybe you just need to look at it
with
>and outside view? Did you change vid card drives?
>
>The first time I (my first char) saw a bard - she was playing her lute next
>to the Qeynos Hills cottages (I think she knew that there is a music
trigger
>there and was having some fun with newbies (like me)). We chatted and I
>found out she was a bard (duh the lute was my first clue!) And when she
>started to move off, I said watch out there is a griz over there. To which
>she responded: "Oh good! I shall slay it!" And then zoomed off across the
>hills doing the Selos run-zoom thing. That was so cool looking - I just
new
>that I would be a bard someday.
>
>Sylly.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Brian Dickens [mailto:briandickens@...]
> Sent: Friday, June 25, 1999 8:19 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Question of Aesthetics
>
> From: Brian Dickens <briandickens@...>
>
>
> I suppose that is a good enough topic for this question.
>Last night, I
> saw a bard playing a song that I thought I had never seen
>before. I
> found out that it was Selo's, but it looked different than
>when I play
> Selo's. It had the white pulsing flashes, but it also had
>small purple
> lights or something. When does Selo's start to look
>different? Anyone
> know?
>
>
